segments.text: Mom , did you see Andy's dog ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , don't tell me that you want a pet dog also .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mom , please . Can I have a pet dog like Andy's ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , you know , we don't have enough room for a pet dog .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mom , we can keep it on the balcony , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , honey , the balcony is full of boxes and things . I'm sorry .
segments.speaker: S2
